input.description: The name of the adapter to use to handle the request. Default adapter name: DellAIMActor.

Unassigns a VMRack from a Server Pool
Sample items Xml:
<items> <item> <targets> <target> <host>localhost</host> <user-name>admin</user-name> <password encryption-type="Base64">YWRtaW4=</password> <protocol>https</protocol> <port>443</port> <use-ssl-certificate>true</use-ssl-certificate> <allow-unsigned-certificate>true</allow-unsigned-certificate> <install-certificate>true</install-certificate> <passphrase>changeit</passphrase> </target> </targets> <target>config1</target> <vmrack-id>PI_WEBSTORE_APACHE.2.0</vmrack-id> <server-pool-id>SP_X86_2_CPU_SERVER</server-pool-id> </item> </items>
Elements' Description:
targets[Conditional]: This tag is required when dynamic target configuration needs to be provided in the request. If no target configuration was provided while enabling and configuring an adapter then it is required to provide this tag. Multiple target configurations can be provided inside this tag.
target[Conditional]: There are two ways in which this tag can be specified.
First Option: This tag when provided under "targets" tag will contain a dynamic target configuration information.
Second Option: When this tag is provided directly under "item" tag then it specifies the target configuration of Dell AIM Controller on which the request will be executed.
Valid values: The value specified for <target> XML element must be same as the value that has been specified for the name attribute of <config> element in Grid Manager adapter configuration.
Default value: If this element is not provided or left empty, the request will be executed on the first defined Grid Manager adapter configuration.
Note: If "target" tag is provided at both the places then dynamic targets configuration will take precedence.
host[Conditional]: Host name or IP address of Dell AIM Controller. This tag is required while providing dynamic targets.
user-name[Conditional]: Username required to authenticate Dell AIM Controller. This tag is required while providing dynamic targets.
password[Conditional]: The password associated with the <user-name> provided. Encrypted password can be provided by providing an "encryption-type" attribute. This tag is required while providing dynamic targets. Valid values for encryption-type are: Plain, Base64
protocol[Optional]: Protocol to connect Dell AIM Controller. This tag is valid here only while providing dynamic targets. Valid values - http, https. Default value - http
port[Optional]: Port associated with protocol provided. This tag is valid here only while providing dynamic targets. Default values - 80 for "http" protocol and 443 for "https" protocol.
use-ssl-certificate[Optional]: Determines whether to establish a secure connection. This tag is valid here only while providing dynamic targets. Valid values: true, false. Default value: false
allow-unsigned-certificate[Optional]: Specifies whether to allow unsigned certificates from trusted zones. This tag is valid here only while providing dynamic targets. Valid values: true, false. Default value: false
install-certificate[Optional]: Determines whether to install certificates. This tag is valid here only while providing dynamic targets. Valid values: true, false. Default value: false
passphrase[Optional]: Specifies the Java Standard Trust Keystore passphrase. This tag is valid here only while providing dynamic targets. Default value: changeit
vmrack-id[Required] ID of the vmrack to be unassigned from the server pool.
server-pool-id[Required] ID of the server pool from which vmrack is unassigned.

documentation.description: Unassigns a VMRack from a Server Pool
